page.title: 13BODFARI DAIRY FARM
page.content: The cows are bought to the shippen at about 6.30 a.m.The milking machine, which works by a vacuum process is connected to the cows udders; the milk travels along the pipeline to the farm's dairy.There the milk passes through a filter and is collected in the tank which holds 115 gallons. The milk tanker arrives at the farm once every day to collect the milk and take it to the Creamery at Llandyrnog. Once a week the milk is tested to determine its quality (GRADE A,B,C or D). The better the quality the more the farmer receives for the milk. Quality can be improved by good feeding of animals and cleanliness of equipment.The pipeline is cleaned with an acid wash and the tank is washed in water and iodine.
